i_value: For every means you would like to deploy, it is important to put your thoughts on paper as not only Ton, but also the minister and everyone else involved in the safeguard ladder to know what is going on in your head

o_values: Check out who Sander is through social media | Deploy an open-source investigation
i_value: You must always ask yourself whether if that what you want to do is necessary, whether it is proportional (i.e. how does the impact of the means relate to the threat of the situation), and whether it is subsidiary (i.e. could you achieve the same with a lighter means).
